data.title: StockTwits Brunch: Saturday June 6, 2009
data.meta_description:
StockTwits: Jun. 06 at 11:55 AM 
another chart-filled session w/ our boy @stevenplace | many thx Steven| thx to all who participated, you are what makes stocktwits great nycthinker: Jun. 06 at 11:55…
data.text:
StockTwits: Jun. 06 at 11:55 AM

another chart-filled session w/ our boy @stevenplace | many thx Steven| thx to all who participated, you are what makes stocktwits great

nycthinker: Jun. 06 at 11:55 AM

I’m bearish on $SPX over the coming 3 months. The last leg of the rally lacks breadth & quality. $GDX, $VCR, $XLF, $XSD underperforming.

Ticker: GDX SPX VCR XLF XSD

Brodieville: Jun. 06 at 11:55 AM

$ZOLT is really on the move- a windpower play. gets very volatile around earnings time though. is always a momentum play.

Ticker: ZOLT

stevenplace: Jun. 06 at 11:55 AM

$$ Markets broke out of their continuation patterns this week, which bodes well technically.

stevenplace: Jun. 06 at 11:54 AM

$$ Well I think that wraps it up for today. I hope you all got some good info out of it. To summarize:
